description: Seed skills for testing the Skillsmith MCP server

skills.name: commit
skills.description: Generate semantic commit messages following conventional commits. Analyzes staged changes and creates meaningful commit messages with proper type prefixes.
skills.author: anthropic

skills.name: review-pr
skills.description: Review pull requests with detailed code analysis. Provides comprehensive feedback on code quality, security, and best practices.
skills.author: anthropic

skills.name: create-pr
skills.description: Create well-documented pull requests with summaries. Automatically generates PR descriptions from commit history.
skills.author: anthropic

skills.name: jest-helper
skills.description: Generate Jest test cases for React components and TypeScript functions. Supports mocking, snapshot testing, and coverage analysis.
skills.author: community

skills.name: vitest-helper
skills.description: Generate Vitest test cases with modern ESM support. Includes component testing, mocking utilities, and coverage configuration.
skills.author: community

skills.name: docker-compose
skills.description: Generate and manage Docker Compose configurations. Supports multi-service setups, networking, and volume management.
skills.author: community

skills.name: prisma-generator
skills.description: Generate Prisma schemas and migrations from existing databases or requirements. Includes type-safe client generation.
skills.author: community

skills.name: api-docs
skills.description: Generate OpenAPI/Swagger documentation from code comments and TypeScript types. Supports REST and GraphQL APIs.
skills.author: community

skills.name: security-scan
skills.description: Scan code for security vulnerabilities and provide remediation suggestions. Detects OWASP Top 10 issues.
skills.author: community

skills.name: workflow-builder
skills.description: Create GitHub Actions workflows with best practices. Supports CI/CD, testing, and deployment pipelines.
skills.author: community

skills.name: llm-prompt-tester
skills.description: Test and iterate on LLM prompts with automated evaluation. Supports A/B testing and prompt versioning.
skills.author: experimental

skills.name: code-refactor
skills.description: Suggest and apply code refactoring patterns. Detects code smells and proposes improvements.
skills.author: experimental

skills.name: react-component
skills.description: Generate React components with TypeScript, styling, and tests. Supports functional components and hooks.
skills.author: community

skills.name: express-api
skills.description: Generate Express.js API endpoints with validation, error handling, and documentation.
skills.author: community

skills.name: graphql-schema
skills.description: Generate GraphQL schemas and resolvers from TypeScript types. Includes subscription support.
skills.author: community

skills.name: untested-tool
skills.description: A newly submitted skill that has not yet been reviewed or assessed. Use with caution and review the source code before using.
skills.author: unknown-contributor
